title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Duplicate name validation is not performed on the first page. The first and second columns should be merged to improve readability.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table is missing a label. Multiple selection is not allowed. The signature preview is not wrapping correctly. The signature preview does not have the same background color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be smaller. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label to provide context. The user should be able to select multiple items. The signature preview should wrap correctly and have the same background color as a hover.
